description: Write datapoints and events to an influxdb database

host.description: URL of the host influxdb server

database.description: Database to connect to on the influxdb server

point-chunk-size.description: Maximum number of points to send in each request to influx

debug.description: Debug mode. If true, data will not be pushed to target

read-extracted-ranges.description: Whether to read start/end points on startup, where possible.

read-extracted-event-ranges.description: Whether to read start/end points for events on startup, where possible

non-finite-replacement.description: Replace all instances of NaN or Infinity with this floating point number
